mainText:
Steve Jobs has inspired me in more ways than I can put into words. He was brilliant and visionary and influenced the entire world. The universe will be sad for its loss of a genius and the most inspiring man living today, easily. 

I feel like I have lost a family member, a close friend-- someone who I can't explain how he has touched my life, but has in every way. 

Rest In Peace Steve Jobs, I send good wishes for your family and will never forget you.
author: Lauren
